mapper.select: SELECT SP.SP_PARENT_ID,SP.SP_ID,SP.SYS_ID,SP.SP_NAME,SP.SP_DESC,SP.HREF,SP.TARGET,SP.SP_VISIBLE,SP.PERMISSION,SP.VERSION,SP.SP_TYPE,SP.ICON,SP.RANK FROM SECURITY_PERMISSION SP WHERE SP.SP_PARENT_ID NOT IN (SELECT SP_ID FROM SECURITY_PERMISSION) AND SP.SP_TYPE != 'button' AND SP.SYS_ID=1 ORDER BY SP.RANK

SELECT SP.SP_PARENT_ID,SP.SP_ID,SP.SYS_ID,SP.SP_NAME,SP.SP_DESC,SP.HREF,SP.TARGET,SP.SP_VISIBLE,SP.PERMISSION,SP.VERSION,SP.SP_TYPE,SP.ICON,SP.RANK FROM SECURITY_PERMISSION SP WHERE SP.SP_ID IN( SELECT SP_ID FROM SECURITY_ROLE_PERMISSION WHERE SR_ID IN(SELECT ur.SR_ID FROM SECURITY_USER_ROLE ur,SECURITY_USER u WHERE ur.SU_ID=u.SU_ID AND u.SU_ACCOUNT=#{account})) ORDER BY SP.RANK
